whoWeServeContentA: We've worked with more than 100 federal, state, and county officials to develop data-driven COVID responses.
whoWeServeContentB: [See our case studies](https://covidactnow.org/case-studies) to learn how other leaders in government, business, public health, education, and local communities use our data and tools to act during this pandemic.
introContent:
Covid Act Now is an independent 501(c)(3) nonprofit founded by volunteers in March 2020. 

We help people make informed decisions by providing timely and accurate data about COVID in every U.S. state, 380+ metros, 3,100+ counties, and two U.S. territories. We are committed to:

* **Data**: We support data- and science-backed policies and decision-making
* **Transparency**: Our data and methodologies are fully open-source so that the public can vet, freely use, and build upon our work
* **Accessibility**: We make data universally accessible so that anyone can easily understand and use it, regardless of ability or prior knowledge

Please note that we are not a government or healthcare organization. We do not provide testing, vaccination, or other on-the-ground COVID services.

partnersContent.copy: Georgetown University Center for Global Health Science and Security, Stanford University Clinical Excellence Research Center, and Harvard Global Health Institute

logos.altText: Stanford Medicine Clinical Excellence Research Center logo

partnersContent.copy: We are funded by Schmidt Futures and the Patrick J. McGovern Foundation, as well as other philanthropists and small donations.

Our data comes from official sources including the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, The New York Times, and official state and county dashboards. Our Covid-19 Community Vulnerability Index comes from Surgo Ventures.

teamIntro: Our multidisciplinary, volunteer-driven team draws on expertise in technology, design, data science, epidemiology, public health, and policy.
joinUsContent:
Want to join us? [Let us know](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfQkdwXsbDbwLHhWwBD6wzNiw54_0P6A60r8hujP3qnaxxFkA/viewform).

Some roles that we need:

* UI/UX Designers
* JavaScript/React, Python engineers
* Epidemiologists
* Data Modelers
* User Support Representatives
* Product Managers
* Social Media Managers
* ...and more!
whoWeServeContent: Hundreds of federal, state, and county governments use our data and tools:

Washington, DC Department of Health Logo

contactUsContent:
For general questions, email [info@covidactnow.org](mailto:info@covidactnow.org).

For press inquiries, email [press@covidactnow.org](mailto:press@covidactnow.org).

If you are with a state or local government, reach out to us at [gov@covidactnow.org](mailto:gov@covidactnow.org).
